languages.text: Махарий Зауэрбэк до последнего дня был предан Вольному Торговцу несмотря на все слухи о его нелояльности. Не снискав любви ни среди подданных, ни в собственной семье, он не изменял себе, оставаясь прямолинейным, жестким и набожным человеком. Всякого, кто зависел от него, Махарий стремился держать в приличествующем страхе перед ним самим и Богом-Императором.

Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.
languages.original_text: Махарий Зауэрбэк до последнего дня был предан Вольному Торговцу несмотря на все слухи о его нелояльности. Не снискав любви ни среди подданных, ни в собственной семье, он не изменял себе, оставаясь прямолинейным, жестким и набожным человеком. Всякого, кто зависел от него, Махарий стремился держать в приличествующем страхе перед ним самим и Богом-Императором.

traits.locale_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader till the last day, despite all the rumours about his disloyalty. Not finding any affection in his subjects or his family, he stayed true to himself, being a forthright, harsh, and pious person. Macharius strived to keep every soul that depended on him in the becoming fear of him and God-Emperor.

languages.text: 马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克自始至终都忠于行商浪人，尽管有很多谣言说事实并非无此。他从不热爱他的臣民或家人，他只忠于自己，永远维持着心中的直率、严厉与虔诚。马卡里乌斯努力确保每个处于他管理之下的灵魂，都能对他与神皇保持着合适的敬畏。
languages.original_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克自始至终都忠于行商浪人，尽管有很多谣言说事实并非无此。他从不迷恋他的臣民或家人，他只忠于自己，永远维持着心中的直率、严厉与虔诚。马卡里乌斯努力确保每个处于他管理之下的灵魂，都能对他与神皇保持着合适的敬畏。

languages.text: Macharius Sauerback blieb {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} bis zum Letzten treu ergeben, trotz anderslautender Gerüchte. Bei seinen Untertanen und in seiner Familie fand er keinerlei Zuneigung, weshalb er sich selbst treu blieb und ein aufrechter, strenger und frommer Mann blieb. Macharius tat alles, damit jede Seele unter seiner Führung gerechtfertigte Furcht vor ihm und vor dem Gottimperator empfand.
languages.original_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Macharius Sauerback blieb {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} bis zum Letzten treu ergeben, trotz anderslautender Gerüchte. Bei seinen Untertanen und in seiner Familie fand er keinerlei Zuneigung, weshalb er sich selbst treu blieb und ein aufrechter, strenger und frommer Mann blieb. Macharius tat alles, damit jede Seele unter seiner Führung gerechtfertigte Furcht vor ihm und vor dem Gottimperator empfand.

languages.text: Macharius Sauerback fut loyal {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} jusqu'au bout, même si certaines rumeurs affirmaient le contraire. Ne recevant que peu de preuves d'affection de la part de ses sujets ou de sa famille, il resta fidèle à lui-même : franc, sévère et pieux. Macharius n'eut de cesse que toutes les âmes placées sous sa responsabilité ressentissent une vive terreur aussi bien devant l'Empereur-Dieu que lui-même.
languages.original_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Macharius Sauerback fut loyal {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} jusqu'au bout, même si certaines rumeurs affirmaient le contraire. Ne recevant aucune preuve d'affection de la part de ses sujets ou de sa famille, il resta fidèle à lui-même : franc, sévère et pieux. Macharius n'eut de cesse que toutes les âmes placées sous sa responsabilité ressentissent une vive terreur aussi bien devant l'Empereur-Dieu que lui-même.

languages.text: Macharius Sauerback fue leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente hasta sus últimos momentos, pese a todos los rumores que indicaban lo contrario. Sin apenas ningún aprecio de sus súbditos y su familia, siguió siendo fiel a sí mismo y continuó con su actitud sincera, seria y pía. Macharius se esforzó para asegurar que todas las almas a su cargo sintieran un miedo respetuoso tanto de él como del Dios Emperador.
languages.original_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Macharius Sauerback fue leal a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente hasta sus últimos momentos, pese a todos los rumores que indicaban lo contrario. Sin el aprecio de sus súbditos y su familia, siguió siendo fiel a sí mismo y continuó con su actitud sincera, seria y pía. Macharius se esforzó para asegurar que todas las almas a su cargo sintieran un miedo respetuoso tanto de él como del Dios Emperador.

languages.text: マハリウス・ザウアーバックは、さまざまな噂にもかかわらず、最後まで自由開拓者に忠実だった。臣下や家族からは、ほとんど愛情を見つけられなかったが、彼は自分自身に忠実で、率直で、厳しく、敬虔な人間であり続けた。マハリウスは、彼の担当するすべての魂が、彼と神帝陛下の両方の前で正当な恐怖を感じるように努めた。
languages.original_text: Macharius Sauerback was loyal to the Rogue Trader to the last, despite all the rumours to the contrary. Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: マハリウス・ザウアーバックは、さまざまな噂にもかかわらず、最後までローグトレーダーに忠実だった。臣下や家族からは愛情を見つけられなかったが、彼は自分自身に忠実で、率直で、厳しく、敬虔な人間であり続けた。マハリウスは、彼の担当するすべての魂が、彼と神帝陛下の両方の前で正当な恐怖を感じるように努めた。

languages.text: Macharius Sauerback, aksi yönde yükselen tüm söylentilere rağmen son ana kadar Hür Tacir'e sadık kaldı. Tebaası veya ailesi tarafından fazla sevilmese de doğru olduğuna inandığı şekilde yaşadı; dobra, haşin ve inançlı biri olarak kaldı. Macharius, sorumluluğu altındaki herkesin, kendisinin ve Tanrı İmparator'un karşısında meşru bir korku duymasını isterdi.

Finding little affection among his subjects or family, he stayed true to himself, remaining a forthright, severe, and pious person. Macharius strived to ensure that every soul in his charge felt justifiable dread before both him and the God-Emperor.
